title: Utahns sought COVID-19 vaccine in good faith. But their slots were a state mistake, and they feel vilified.
content:
1. Utahns sought COVID-19 vaccine in good faith. But their slots were a state mistake, and they feel vilified.  Salt Lake Tribune
  2. Ohio expands availability for COVID-19 vaccine: Here's who is now eligible  WLWT Cincinnati
  3. Gov. Scott to open vaccinations to Vermont educators, those with chronic medical conditions  WPTZ
  4. Ohio moves into next COVID-19 vaccine phase: age 60 and older, people with certain conditions and professions  The Cincinnati Enquirer
  5. The Philippines begins its inoculation campaign, but public distrust runs deep.  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Utahns sought COVID-19 vaccine in good faith. But their slots were a state mistake, and they feel vilified.  Salt Lake Tribune

localize.title: 犹他州人诚心寻求COVID-19疫苗。但他们的槽点是国家的错误，他们觉得被中伤了。
猶他州人誠心尋求COVID-19疫苗。但他們的槽點是國家的錯誤，他們覺得被中傷了。
